entry.title: Sunday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to flurries or rain showers this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 01 January 2023
